content: Hey @T-lang -- so next week is Thanksgiving in the US, and Mozilla is giving the week off. I haven't decided just how many meetings to attend, but I'd like to cancel the design meeting, and I guess that I think we should either cancel the triage meeting or have @Josh Triplett commit to running it =)
I'm in favor of canceling both meetings for Thanksgiving week. (And, in advance, for the weeks of Christmas and New Years as well.)
